name: Rosalya with Short Hair
description:
⧸ Style for http://www.mycandylove.com/ full list ↴ ⧸
Inspired/based on a tumblr post by Yukimora, I present: Rosalya WITH SHORT HAIR. I don't know if anyone wanted this, but here it is, and here it stays. Note: I'm still using the old art at the moment, including some new expressions I put together for the more recent episodes. The images needed for chinomiko's new art style is pretty much done, I just can't decide on a hairstyle. If you're interested in helping me decide, I'd appreciate it. Vote here to participate in the poll. Of course, the final project will be more polished than what's shown there, but it gets my current hair ideas across.
